product_name: Lowa Zephyr Mid Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: Lightweight, supportive midsole frames on the Lowa Zephyr Mid hiking boots wrap around your feet for continous support on the trail. Cushioning helps protect feet from the repeated impact of hiking. Polyurethane MONOWRAP(R) frames wrap around your feet to provide lateral stability; integrated polyurethane midsoles deliver amazing shock absorption. Split-grain leather uppers feature breathable mesh panels for exceptional ventilation; synthetic mesh linings wick moisture away from your feet, keeping them dry. 3/4-length, stabilizing nylon shanks provide stiffness and support underfoot. Rubber outsoles provide sure-footed traction on mixed terrain.
short_description: Lightweight, supportive midsole frames on the Lowa Zephyr Mid hiking boots wrap around your feet for continous support on the trail. Cushioning helps protect feet from the repeated impact of hiking.
